item.title: US heat wave smothers Pacific Northwest, poses extreme risk in California and Arizona
item.description: Residents in the Western U.S. are enduring a heat wave with temperatures reaching dangerous levels across Washington, Oregon, Southern California, Nev...

item.title: 21 hospitalized after bus carrying junior high football team crashes near Pittsburgh
item.description: A bus carrying a junior high football team to a game crashed Saturday north of Pittsburgh, sending 21 of the 28 people on board to the hospital

item.title: Judge strikes down Minnesota law banning religious tests for college credit program
item.description: A federal judge has ruled that religious colleges in Minnesota that require students to sign a statement of faith cannot be excluded from a program al...

item.title: Beaches reopen in New York and North Carolina after Hurricane Erin
item.description: New York and North Carolina have begun reopening beaches that had been closed due to Hurricane Erin

item.title: Texas Gov. Abbott vows to approve GOP-leaning congressional voting map
item.description: Texas Gov. Greg Abbott has promised to sign a new congressional voting map designed to help Republicans maintain their slim majority in Congress
